title: Hey everyone. have a problem with Macbook Air 820-3208  1. No chime 2. Audio icon showing  Computer works fine otherwise.  Any suggestions? thank you
message: Check PVDD and SHDN* at U6210.

title: Hey everyone. have a problem with Macbook Air 820-3208  1. No chime 2. Audio icon showing  Computer works fine otherwise.  Any suggestions? thank you
Hey everyone. have a problem with Macbook Air 820-3208  1. No chime 2. Audio icon showing  Computer works fine otherwise.  Any suggestions? thank you
message:
I said SHDN*.
That "*" means something.
In theory, this signal should be high; low level means enabled, no sound (shoutdown).
The thing is that outside name is R_SPKRAMP_SHDN and then should really be 0V.

However, already found an error (signal name) about an audio reset on Apple schematics.
You should compare that value with an working board.

title: Hey everyone. have a problem with Macbook Air 820-3208  1. No chime 2. Audio icon showing  Computer works fine otherwise.  Any suggestions? thank you
message: i fixed it i reflode the u6210 now it has sound thank again i really appreciate your help i wouldn't be able to fix these machines with out your help
